page.title: Disney Expanding Video Game Investment
page.text: LOS ANGELES (Reuters) - Walt Disney Co. <A HREF="http://www.reuters.co.uk/financeQuoteLookup.jhtml?ticker=DIS.N qtype=sym infotype=info qcat=news">DIS.N</A> is increasing investment in video games for hand-held devices and plans to look for acquisitions of small game publishers and developers, Disney consumer products Chairman Andy Mooney said on Monday.
